formula: Lim sup n->infinity (|a(n)|/n!)^(1/n) = 2.0027513568... = abs(1/r), where r is the complex root of the equation (r+1)*exp(sin(r)) = exp(I). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 02 2013
author: Patrick Demichel (patrick.demichel(AT)hp.com)
extensions: Prepended missing a(0)=0 from _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 01 2013
